first_para: Clive Peedell is an English doctor specialising in clinical oncology. He is a co-leader and co-founder of the National Health Action Party for which he is standing as a prospective parliamentary candidate for Witney against Prime Minister David Cameron in the United Kingdom general election, 2015.

full.extract: Clive Peedell is an English doctor specialising in clinical oncology. He is a co-leader and co-founder of the National Health Action Party for which he is standing as a prospective parliamentary candidate for Witney against Prime Minister David Cameron in the United Kingdom general election, 2015.
full.title: Clive Peedell
